description: Verify rejection when Redemption Shares > Available Shares (Rule BR-RDM-002). Scenario: User has 1000 total shares but only 500 available. User attempts to redeem 800.
source_rule_logic: If the requested redemption shares exceed the 'availableShares', the transaction must be immediately rejected by the TA system with the status 'TA_REJECTED' and message 'INSUFFICIENT_SHARES', even if 'totalShares' is sufficient to cover the request.
